elements.name: To create new booking using cucumber Data Table

steps.name: user has access to endpoint "/booking"
user creates a booking
user should get the response code 200
user validates the response with JSON schema "createBookingSchema.json"

elements.name: To create new booking using cucumber Data Table

steps.name: user has access to endpoint "/booking"
user creates a booking
user should get the response code 200
user validates the response with JSON schema "createBookingSchema.json"

elements.name: To create new booking using Excel data

steps.name: user has access to endpoint "/booking"
user creates a booking using data "createBooking1" from Excel
user should get the response code 200
user validates the response with JSON schema from Excel

elements.name: To create new booking using Excel data

steps.name: user has access to endpoint "/booking"
user creates a booking using data "createBooking2" from Excel
user should get the response code 200
user validates the response with JSON schema from Excel

elements.name: To create new booking using JSON data

steps.name: user has access to endpoint "/booking"
user creates a booking using data "createBooking1" from JSON file "bookingBody.json"
user should get the response code 200
user validates the response with JSON schema "createBookingSchema.json"

elements.name: To create new booking using JSON data

steps.name: user has access to endpoint "/booking"
user creates a booking using data "createBooking2" from JSON file "bookingBody.json"
user should get the response code 200
user validates the response with JSON schema "createBookingSchema.json"

name: To create a new booking in restful-booker

elements.name: create an auth token

steps.name: user has access to endpoint "/auth"
user creates a auth token with credential "admin" & "password123"
user should get the response code 200

elements.name: To delete a booking

steps.name: user has access to endpoint "/booking"
user makes a request to view booking IDs
user makes a request to delete booking with basic auth "admin" & "password123"
user should get the response code 201

elements.name: create an auth token

steps.name: user has access to endpoint "/auth"
user creates a auth token with credential "admin" & "password123"
user should get the response code 200

elements.name: To perform a CURD operation on restful-booker

steps.name: user has access to endpoint "/booking"
user creates a booking
user should get the response code 200
user validates the response with JSON schema "createBookingSchema.json"
user updates the details of a booking
user should get the response code 200
user validates the response with JSON schema "bookingDetailsSchema.json"
user makes a request to view details of a booking ID
user should get the response code 200
user validates the response with JSON schema "bookingDetailsSchema.json"
user makes a request to delete booking with basic auth "admin" & "password123"
user should get the response code 201

name: To delete a booking in restful-booker

user creates a booking using data "createBooking1" from Excel
user updates the booking details using data "updateBooking1" from Excel
user should get the response code 200
user validates the response with JSON schema from Excel

elements.name: To partially update a booking

steps.name: user has access to endpoint "/booking"
user makes a request to view booking IDs
user makes a request to update first name "John" & Last name "Wick"
user should get the response code 200
user validates the response with JSON schema "bookingDetailsSchema.json"

name: To update a booking in restful-booker

elements.name: To view all the booking IDs

steps.name: user has access to endpoint "/booking"
user makes a request to view booking IDs
user should get the response code 200
user should see all the booking IDs

elements.name: To view booking details

steps.name: user has access to endpoint "/booking"
user makes a request to view booking IDs
user makes a request to view details of a booking ID
user should get the response code 200
user validates the response with JSON schema "bookingDetailsSchema.json"

elements.name: To view all the booking IDs by booking dates

steps.name: user has access to endpoint "/booking"
user makes a request to view booking IDs from "2018-01-01" to "2021-12-31"
user should get the response code 200
user should see all the booking IDs

elements.name: To view all the booking IDs by booking dates

steps.name: user has access to endpoint "/booking"
user makes a request to view booking IDs from "2010-01-01" to "2020-12-31"
user should get the response code 200
user should see all the booking IDs

elements.name: To view all the booking IDs by booking names

steps.name: user has access to endpoint "/booking"
user makes a request to view booking IDs
user should see all the booking IDs
user makes a request to view details of a booking ID
user makes a request to view all the booking IDs of that user name
user should get the response code 200
user should see all the booking IDs

elements.name: To confirm whether the API is up and running

steps.name: user has access to endpoint "/ping"
user makes a request to check the health of booking service
user should get the response code 201

name: To view the restful-booker booking details
